title: Stone Financial Network: Russian Oligarch Funding Channels (2014-2025)
description: Trace the financial relationships between Roger Stone and Russian oligarch networks, identifying funding sources, money laundering mechanisms, and the evolution from lobbying payments to intelligence operation funding.
research_areas: Which Russian oligarchs provided financial support to Roger Stone operations?
How did Stone structure financial relationships to obscure Russian funding?
What evidence exists of payments for specific intelligence activities?
How did Stone's financial arrangements change after 2016 election interference exposure?
What ongoing financial relationships exist between Stone and Russian networks?
source_requirements: Banking records, corporate filings, financial intelligence reports, sanctions evasion documentation
pdf_source: Roger Stone's Russian Influence Network_ From Lobbying to Intelligence Operations.pdf
